p: RNA isolated from the mesentery of regenerating and non-regenerating sea cucumbers was sequenced at the Sequencing and Genotyping Facility of the University of Puerto Rico. Sequencing libraries were prepared using the TruSeq Stranded mRNA Library Prep Kit (Illumina, USA). Paired-end sequencing (2 × 150) was performed with the Illumina NextSeq 500 system.
